channel.title: How about porting a clone of runescape classic onto playstation 2?
channel.description:
there is a person who has remade it completely in c# : http://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.youtube.com/watch%3Fv%3Dx9mtT1uFiSs&sa=U&ei=OAFQVYGcEMvfoATelYGoDQ&ved=0CBUQtwIwAA&usg=AFQjCNHfom3bbWbWh72xy_Pqg_xe4qh9ew
also, he is working on poriting it to playstation vita. but i was wondering, if it would be possible to port it to ps2...

item.title: How about porting a clone of runescape classic onto playstation 2?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

Linux for PlayStation 2

Linux for PlayStation 2 (or PS2 Linux) is a kit released by Sony Computer Entertainment in 2002 that allows the PlayStation 2 console to be used as a personal computer. It included a Linux-based operating system, a USB keyboard and mouse, a VGA adapter, a PS2 network adapter (Ethernet only), and a 40 GB hard disk drive (HDD). An 8 MB memory card is required; it must be formatted during installation, erasing all data previously saved on it, though afterwards the remaining space may be used for sav...

Considering this exists, write it in C/C++ or any higher level language that the OS supports (probably not Java since I am unaware of a MIPS JVM port) and bam. It’ll be slow as dogshit, though.

Read full topic
item.source: How about porting a clone of runescape classic onto playstation 2?

item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:10, topic:551466”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=670382.msg4485531#msg4485531 date=1433782521]

Didn’t someone in this community also have a semi-working port of RS2 running on the original Xbox?

Iirc it was speljohan who did it. I am sure someone on irc has a link to his video.
[/quote]
Afaik the youtube video is down.[/quote]
Negative:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,525072.msg3822086.html#msg3822086
